con:config.con:query: SELECT BUSINESSKEY, LOG_ID,BANK_ORG_ID, FK_EVENT_TYPE_ID, ACCOUNT_NUMBER, EVENT_TYPE.SUBCATEGORY FROM EVENT_LOG INNER JOIN EVENT_TYPE ON EVENT_LOG.FK_EVENT_TYPE_ID = EVENT_TYPE.EVENT_TYPE_ID WHERE BUSINESSKEY = '${PaymentRead#Response#declare namespace ns4='urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:paymentinitiation:v2_0'; declare namespace ns2='urn:pins.payment.evry.com:ws:paymentinitiation:v2_0'; //ns2:PaymentReadResponse[1]/ns2:paymentResult[1]/ns4:result[1]/ns4:transactionId[1]}' ORDER BY EVENT_TYPE.SUBCATEGORY ASC
